definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:MelatoninPill</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§4Your current side effect chance: </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:heart_attack_chance</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">%</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="is_key_pressed"><field name="key">Shift</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7Side effects include: heart attacks, heart palpitations, migraines, recurring nightmares, weird cheese dreams, fever dreams, increased chance of dementia, hallucinations, hardbans, possible chance of never waking up.</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7Hold §6SHIFT §7for side effects</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
